korean: 친구들과 함께 근처 산에 등산을 갔다.
올라갈 때는 힘들었지만 정상에서 본 경치가 정말 멋있었어.
다음에는 더 높은 산에 도전해보고 싶다.
english: So this weekend, a group of my friends and I decided to go hiking on this mountain that's near our town.
We'd been talking about doing it for weeks, and we finally made it happen today.
We started early in the morning to avoid the heat and the crowds, which was a good call.
The trail at the beginning was pretty easy and flat, so we were all chatting and having a good time.
But then as we got higher, the path got steeper and way more challenging.
My legs were burning and I was breathing so hard - honestly, I'm not in as good shape as I thought.
There were moments where I was like, why did I agree to this? This is torture.
But my friends kept encouraging me and we took breaks whenever someone needed to catch their breath.
When we finally reached the summit after like two hours of climbing, the view was absolutely incredible.
You could see the whole valley below us and the sky was so clear and blue.
Breathing in that fresh mountain air made me feel so refreshed and alive, you know?
The whole experience made me want to try an even higher and more challenging mountain next time.
